channel.title: Extension Methods :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: In order to use LINQ with your IEnumerable collections, you must include this using statement: using System.LINQ Without it, the LINQ collection methods will not be available. You might be wondering why, as your collections are mostly defined in the System.Collections or System.Collections.Generic namespaces. The answer is that LINQ on collections is implemented using extension methods. This is a C# feature that allows you to add methods to any class, even a sealed class.
